sentences.sContent: Best way to "match" an array of polygon vertices to another?
sentences.sContent_eng: Best way to "match" an array of polygon vertices to another?
sentences.sCn: 最佳方法“匹配”多边形顶点到另一个数组?。

sentences.sContent: However, in other games I want to hide the polygon structure.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, in other games I want to hide the polygon structure.
sentences.sCn: 但是，在其他游戏里我想要隐藏多边形结构。

sentences.sContent: Although the bounding box is a polygon defining the area represented for the user, I simplify and use one point of this data.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although the bounding box is a polygon defining the area represented for the user, I simplify and use one point of this data.
sentences.sCn: 尽管这个边界框是一个用于定义表示用户的区域的多边形，但我简化并使用这些数据的一个点。

remMethod.val: poly(多的) + gon(角) → 多角形， 多边形

words.tran: [数] 多边形的；[数] 多角形的

trans.tranOther: a flat shape with three or more sides
